pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualizing of Distributions of Covariance Matrices // Visualizing of distributions of covariance matrices. The package implements the methodology described in Tokuda, T., Goodrich, B., Van Mechelen, I., Gelman, A., Tuerlinckx, F. (2012) https://stat.columbia.edu/~gelman/research/unpublished/V isualization.pdf.
